concept-wr.title: In-Service Patches
concept-wr.shortdesc: In-Service Patching provides a mechanism to issue patches that do not require a reboot, allowing the patch to be installed on in-service nodes and restarting affected processes as needed.

conbody.p: Depending on the area of software being patched and the type of software change, installation of the patch may or may not require the Titanium Server hosts to be rebooted. Patches are classified as reboot required or reboot not required (also refered to as in-service) type patches to indicate this.
